entry.p: To meet Rpath of <3.5mΩ from VRM to VCCPRIM_VNNAON BGA groups, route VCCPRIM_VNNAON plane on at least three 30um-thick copper layers from VRM output to processor BGA with the following conditions :
► When routing on the top or bottom layer, keep plane width at least 15mm at VRM region & not lesser than 7mm upon approaching BGA region
► When routing on buildup layers (minimum 2 layers), keep plane width at least 10mm at VRM region & not lesser than 6mm upon approaching BGA region
Short all VCCPRIM_VNNAON BGAs with plane on at least of two 30um-thick copper layers
VCCPRIM_VNNAON VRM uses pseudo differential sensing to compensate for voltage drops along the power delivery path. The PWR & GND sense lines are connected to BP14 & BP12 BGAs respectively
Short both VCCPRIM_VNNAON_FLTR BGAs (CM16 & CM18) with plane
Merge both VCCPRIM_VNNAON_FLTR & VCCPRIM_VNNAON power planes using 1 x 0603 1uH (120mΩ max DCR) inductor & 1 x 0603 22uF cap to form an LC-filter with the following conditions :
► Place the LC-filter <1mm distance from or underneath VCCPRIM_VNNAON & VCCPRIM_VNNAON_FLTR BGAs
► Ensure the merging point for both VCCPRIM_VNNAON & VCCPRIM_VNNAON_FLTR planes are <1mm distance from or underneath VCCPRIM_VNNAON_FLTR BGAs
Note : Refer diagram for design implementation guidance
Place VRM bulk cap or additional MLCC caps to keep sense voltage below threshold limit & to fulfill PD requirements
Heighten capacitor effectiveness by placing them from VRM output to package in the following order : 0402 → 0603 → 0805 → Bulk
Establish robust return path for decoupling capacitor by minimizing the distance between power & ground via pairs as well as placing the via pairs as close as possible to the capacitor pads
When placing capacitors, align their pads to the current path flowing from VR to package
Customers can choose capacitors of any form factor provided the caps meet the recommended parasitic capacitance.
Place bulk cap near to VRM output
Place caps near to VRM output
Place caps near to VRM output
Place 1 x 0603 47uF cap under processor die shadow of VCCPRIM_VNNAON BGAs
Place 2 x 0603 47uF caps <1mm from VCCPRIM_VNNAON PTH located underneath BGA
Place 5 x 0603 22uF caps <10mm from package edge. Make sure PWR-GND PTH pair is placed very close to cap terminals
Place 4 x 0402 10uF caps underneath BGA or <1mm from package edge. Make sure PWR-GND PTH pair is placed very close to cap terminals
Pair 1 x 0603 22uF VCCPRIM_VNNAON_FLTR cap with 1 x 0603 1uH (120mΩ max DCR) inductor <1mm from or underneath VCCPRIM_VNNAON_FLTR BGAs to form an LC-filter
Merge both VCCPRIM_VNNAON_FLTR & VCCPRIM_VNNAON power planes using 1 x 0603 1uH (120mΩ max DCR) inductor & 1 x 0603 22uF cap to form an LC-filter with the following conditions :
► Place the LC-filter <1mm distance from or underneath VCCPRIM_VNNAON & VCCPRIM_VNNAON_FLTR BGAs
► Ensure the merging point for both VCCPRIM_VNNAON & VCCPRIM_VNNAON_FLTR planes are <1mm distance from or underneath VCCPRIM_VNNAON_FLTR BGAs
